runs.comm: he's gone for the very first ball with a huge shot! No holding back from Shahzad. He charged down the track and slashed it high over point. The ball fell to earth just in front of the boundary marker.
a much more muted stroke, the batsman leaning forward and tapping it softly to cover for a quick single.
past the inside edge! Ghani's feet didn't move, and the ball shot in at him off the seam to beat his drive.
quick single! Mpofu slung down a very full ball at his toes, and they take a leg bye as it rolls close by on the leg side.

big play and a miss! Shahzad wanted to hit the covers off this one, and has almost swung himself off his feet. The ball flies through to Mutumbami, and Mpofu wanders down to ask Shahzad exactly where he was trying to hit that one (perhaps). Whatever he's saying, he has a big smile on his face.
nudged off the hip, the ball rolling through square leg.
this looked like an offcutter, coming in off the track. The batsman chops it down towards point.
this leaves the right-hander off the pitch, and it's cut slightly harder at point. It's Williams in the position, and the ball bursts through his hands to allow runs.
driven just wide of Raza at extra cover, and they scoot through for one
slugged down the ground, over the bowler's head, but not hard enough to beat Chigumbura at mid-off
swiped into the leg side, where Waller stops it cleanly at midwicket. The batsmen chance a single, and Waller's shy only just misses the stumps. Close!

appeal for lbw! The ball was full on off stump, and it looked a good shout - but it didn't sound right. Definitely two sounds. The ball rushed past Mutumbami and down to third man. Off the bat, and given four.
welcome to the game! Madziva offers a short ball on middle, but Ghani is equal to it, hammering a pull to deep midwicket.
play and a miss this time! Ghani came down the track and wanted to hit this straight, but it was too wide of him and whizzed past the bat.
pushed too far down the leg side, called wide.
a good follow up, rising on off stump. The batsman defends.
Madziva is definitely going after Ghani with the short ball. But this is misdirected towards leg stump, and his pull beats two fielders to reach the long leg boundary.
top-edged! Another short ball, another hook, and it flies over the keeper's gloves
Shahzad backs away, and Muzarabani follows him. The ball flies off the thigh pad, having beaten the bat, and rolls to short third man.
powered back past the bowler! Ghani didn't move his feet at all, he just stood at the crease and smeared the ball down the ground.
and so Muzarabani retorts with a bouncer, the ball whistling past the batsman's grille. Ghani looks a little unsettled.
yorker this time, and it curves in towards Ghani's toes as he backs away to leg. He swings at it, but ball beats bat yet again, and Mutumbami stops it.
this looked like a slower ball, on a length on off stump. Defended to cover.
swiped down to long-on, just the single as there's a man down there.
very full, right on off stump, and it's dug out to mid-off. The batsmen hustle a single.
Madziva relied on the short ball in his last over, now he seems to be aiming for the yorker. Shahzad jams the bat down on one on off stump, and another quick single is taken
top-edged! Too quick for Ghani. The short ball rushes on to him, touching the splice of his flailing bat and flying over a leaping Mutumbami.
short again, though not quite a bouncer. Ghani swats it to mid-on.
hoicked out to wide long-on. The ball was full outside off, but Ghani fetched it into the leg side with plenty of bottom hand.
yet another short one. Ghani looked like he was expecting it, waiting deep in the crease, and he pulls out to the man at deep square leg.

neither, it seems, is Ghani. He's middled this one! Mpofu hasn't followed Madziva's line of attack, instead slinging down a full ball on middle stump. Ghani came down the track to it and slammed it straight down the ground.
the fast bowler's response is, perhaps a little predictably, a bouncer this time, but it's misdirected down the leg side.
that's a better bouncer! This has almost knocked Ghani over. He had to get down very quickly, and tumbled over backwards

play and a miss now! Ghani came at the bowler, trying to get close to another short one, but the ball leapt past him. There's plenty of chatter between the bowler and the batsman, and Shahzad is also getting involved. It's all happening!
just short of a good length, but angled down the leg side once more.
scooped off his hip, and out into the deep. They rush back for the second.
yet another short ball, Mpofu really bending his back into this one. But Ghani flings his hands quickly through the line of the ball to pull to long leg, and they take the fielder on for another two.
Mpofu ends his over with a yorker, and it's a good one, swinging in towards middle and leg. Ghani digs it out just wide of mid-on for a single
waits in his crease to force the ball to long-on
pushed through flat and fast outside off to beat Shahzad's drive. Mutumbami collects.
slammed down the ground! Shahzad read the length early and picked it up straight back past the bowler.
another dart on off stump, but this one is carved out to the sweeper cover.
big hit! Ghani found the ball looped up to him on off stump, and smashed it high over the bowler's head, the ball smacking straight into the sight screen.
sliced to backward point, where its cleanly stopped, and they don't risk a single.
comes around the wicket, and he's cut out to the sweeper cover .
backs way away to leg, Williams follows him, tapped down the ground.
stays deep in his crease to punch off the back foot to extra cover.
play and a miss outside off, the batsman looking to cut.
now he does hit the cut, and he gets it right between the point and short third man fielders. Maiden T20 international fifty for the young man! Shahzad comes down the wicket to give him a big hug.
ah, but then he plays and misses again. Williams stays over the wicket, and the ball was a bit too close to him to be cutting anyway.
very full on off stump, and Shahzad eases into a drive to get the ball to long off.
just a touch short on middle and leg, and it's pulled to deep square.
Shahzad backs away to leg to crack the ball to long on.
bottom edges a big heave to the leg side, but the ball beats the stumps and the keeper to go to fine leg.
chopped down to short third man, where Waller sprints in and hurls a shy at the non-striker's end. But the batsman is safely home.
Ghani adds one more run to his total with a drive to long-on
an attempted reverse sweep, with no one on the point and third man boundaries. But he's swished right past the ball, nothing on it.
slapped down to long-on
flicked off his toes, just wide of midwicket
another missed cut! Williams is testing Ghani on off stump. This was too close to him, and he tried to manufacture a shot
this is cut right off middle stump, and straight to point. Williams has his hands on his head
again Ghani backs away to expose his stumps, trying to upset Williams' leg stump line, and this time he punches to long off
high over wide long-on! The ball was picked up off a length, and landed several rows back.
slightly fuller this time, on off stump, and it's heaved out to deep midwicket. There's a slight fumble from Raza, and they take two.
a slower ball is floated down too wide of off, called by the umpire.
slapped to long-on, where Masakadza is quickly in off the rope. But he attacks the ball a little too enthusiastically, and over-runs it, allowing the batsmen to take a second run

superb catch! I didn't think he could possibly get to this. Ghani set his eye on a full ball on off stump, and hammered it in the air straight down the ground. Madziva was at long-off, and he charged around the boundary towards the ball. But it was dropping on him the whole time, and he had to dive to even get close. Somehow, he's got his fingers underneath it, and Zimbabwe have the breakthrough.

two in two! Both openers depart now. Chibhabha sent this down very full again, aimed at the base of middle really, and Shahzad missed his flick into the leg side. The bowler appealed, the umpire agreed, and Zimbabwe celebrate another one. Shahzad seems to be indicating that it was a slower ball, out of the back of the hand.
ends his over with a good, probing delivery on off stump that's nudged down to backward point
punched through extra cover, off the back foot.
a quick little dart is dug out back to the bowler.
swept past a diving Ervine at short fine leg! The shot went in the air, but about a metre past the fielder. Firmly struck.
a firm drive gets the ball out to deep cover again.
cracking ball! This pitched on middle, from over the wicket, and turned away sharply to beat Gulbadin's forward poke.
looped down very full, with plenty of air, and he hammers a drive between the long-off and cover fielders.
swiped out to long-on with plenty of bottom hand.
Gulbadin set himself for the slog sweep to the medium-pacer, but the ball comes off his thigh and rolls to fine leg
dug in outside off, really short and really slow. It's slapped out into the deep. Ah, and he's also overstepped. Free hit time
but he can't make the most of it. The ball makes a hollow sound against the bat, and Raza runs in from midwicket to keep them to one.
just short of a good length outside off, and another slower ball I think. It's carved out off the back foot.
pulled to the left of Ervine at short fine leg. He puts in some long strides to get close to it, and then dives to get a hand on the ball, but he can't stop the runs.
flicked into the leg side once more, and this time it beats Ervine's left hand and the long leg fielder has to run around to cut it off. The batsmen push hard for another two.
sweeps at a ball that pitches outside leg stump, and it touches his thigh before bouncing up towards Mutumbami, and away from the stumps.
this time he connects! Gulbadin has a little shimmy down and swipes this cleanly, and wide of long on for four.
a sliced drive flies out through extra cover.
flighted up nice and high by Williams. Nabi waits and waits, then pushes it down the ground.
a top-edged sweep loops up and over Mutumbami's head, falling safely as the short third man fielder runs back and around to get it back in.
tip and run single! Afghanistan are pushing for every run. This was hit straight to point, but the batsmen just took him on
a leading edge! Gulbadin set his sights on the leg side boundary, but this flew in the opposite direction, falling short of long-off.
nicely hit. Gulbadin got across to the off side, and then got down low to aim a front foot pull through the gap at square leg.
sliced up and over extra cover now, the sweeper sprinting around to stop the boundary.
drilled down to long-on, just the one.

oooh, that's a very important strike! The in-form Nabi is gone! They've pushed for one too many! Nabi lifted a length delivery up and over point, and Mpofu sprinted in from the cover boundary to cut it off. He got there quickly, and the batsmen decided to take on his arm with a second run. But Mpofu is one of Zimbabwe's best outfielders, and his bullet throw went straight into Mutumbami's gloves, the wicketkeeper disturbing the stumps with Nabi short. Advantage Zimbabwe.
Najibullah is forward to drive, but Raza dives to stop the shot at extra cover. Plenty of appreciation from the crowd for his effort.
Make that 54! Pulled to the midwicket boundary! The ball wasn't all that short, but the batsman was waiting for anything that could be hit into the leg side, and middled the stroke.
hacked down into the covers, and as the fielder gets around they take a single.
swatted down to long on for one.
lands this very close to the batsman, who can't get underneath it as he swings to leg. Midwicket fields on the bounce.
Madziva sprays an attempted yorker well wide of off stump, a big wide.
heaved down to long on, where Raza comes in from the rope to stop it on the bounce.

finds the necessary boundary! This wasn't all that bad of a delivery, aimed at Gulbadin's toes, but he got across to the off side and aimed a paddle-flick wide of the fielder at short fine leg. With the fielder up, he just had to beat one man to get four.

or maybe not because he's bowled him! That will help Zimbabwe. The dangerous Najibullah has his leg stump knocked out of the ground. The ball wasn't a yorker, but it was right up to him, and he would have been better off aiming straight. But he swung across the line, and right past the ball.
Sadiq is off the mark straight away, pinching a quick single into the covers.

hammered down the ground with a resounding crack off the bat. Williams charges around on the boundary from long-on, dives and slides to stop it. Just the kind of desperate stuff you see in a tense T20 chase.
great delivery at this stage of the game. Muzarabani delivers a yorker on off stump, and the best the batsman can do is dig it out to cover.
another ball lands close to the blockhole, and it's swiped down to Williams at long-on.
the ball has struck the pad, but the bowler's appeal is turned down. Gulbadin was looking to scoop this over short fine leg. The ball definitely looked to be headed down the leg side
make that 38 from 18. Mpofu flings this full ball too wide outside off.
that's better. He spears down another full ball, close to yorker length, and it slips under the bat outside off.
heaved out into the leg side, and that's four! He placed it perfectly, as there are two men out there, right between square leg and deep midwicket
crunched to long-on, and they take on the fielder to turn one into two
great shot! Fearless stuff. Gulbadin walks across to off and scoops this cleanly over the fielder at short fine leg. This is a career best effort with the bat for him
and another! This was a full toss, dipping towards leg stumps, and he cleared his front leg to slap it through square leg. The fine leg fielder runs around, but he can't get there.
quick single! Mpofu ends with a sharp yorker that's dug out down the track. Mpofu sets after it, and hits the stumps, but Sadiq is home
sliced up and over cover, the ball plugging in the outfield as they rush back for two. And that's fifty for Gulbadin! From 28 deliveries, his first in T20Is.
big hit! It was a full toss, and Sadiq picked it up so cleanly over long leg. It hits the tin roof of the low stand there, and bounces away between some buildings. They might need a new ball...
that's a better delivery from the seamer, but it's clubbed to midwicket. And they push for two
Sadiq fakes a walk into the leg side, then steps way across to off as Muzarabani delivers. But he can only toe end it to short third man.
slapped hard down to long off, and the batsmen scurry back for two! Great running.

what reactions! The ball was smashed hard back at Muzarabani, into the ground. It seemed sure to go past him, but he stuck a hand out and caught it. Sadiq was way out of his crease at the non-striker's end, and Muzarabani immediately broke the stumps with a quick throw.
hammered down to long-off. They were always going to push for two, and they get them safely.
well bowled! Mpofu charges in and delivers a full pace yorker, curving in through the air and landing wide of off stump. Ball beats bat, and it's a dot ball.
the paddle sweep beats short fine leg! Brave shot! He got down very low, expecting the yorker, and beat Ervine with the shot.
swiped to long-on, Masakadza is around quickly and fires back a throw. They can only get a single!

down the ground! That's the game! Afghanistan have won it! They have taken the series 2-0! Naib somehow got his bat underneath this full ball, and chipped it down the ground. The fielders sprinted in from long-on and long-off, but they couldn't stop the two!
